mapper.insert:
select FeedPostId_seq.nextval from dual;
insert into FeedPost values (${feedPostId}, ${userNo}, #{body}, sysdate, ${writeTemp}, ${writeTempRange}, ${writePtyCode}, ${writeSkyCode})
mapper.select: select * from feedpost order by feedpostid desc

select f.* from (select fe.*, row_number() over(order by fe.FeedPostId desc) rn, m.userNickName, m.address1, m.address2, m.sysName as profileSysName, thum.sysName as thumbNailSysName from feedPost fe left join (select mem.userNo, mem.userNickName, mem.address1, mem.address2, prof.SysName from member mem left join photo prof on mem.userNo = prof.userNo) m on fe.UserNo = m.userNo left join (select feedPostID, sysName from (select p1.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY p1.feedpostid order by p1.feedpostid) rn2 from photo p1 inner join photo p2 on p1.feedpostid = p2.feedpostid) where rn2=1) thum on fe.feedPostId = thum.feedPostId ) f where rn between ${startFeedNum} and ${endFeedNum} order by rn asc

select f.* from (select fe.*, (select ABS(fe.writeTemp - ${targetTemp}) from dual) as writeTempDiff, (select ABS(fe.writeTempRange - ${targetTempRange}) from dual) as writeTempRangeDiff, row_number() over(order by fe.FeedPostId desc) rn, m.userNickName, m.address1, m.address2, m.sysName as profileSysName, thum.sysName as thumbNailSysName from feedpost fe left join (select mem.userNo, mem.userNickName, mem.address1, mem.address2, prof.SysName from member mem left join photo prof on mem.userNo = prof.userNo) m on fe.UserNo = m.userNo left join (select feedPostID, sysName from (select p1.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY p1.feedpostid order by p1.feedpostid) rn2 from photo p1 inner join photo p2 on p1.feedpostid = p2.feedpostid) where rn2=1) thum on fe.feedPostId = thum.feedPostId order by writeTempDiff asc, writeTempRangeDiff asc ) f where rn between ${startFeedNum} and ${endFeedNum} order by rn asc

select f.* from (select fe.*, row_number() over (order by fe.feedpostid desc) as rn, m.userNickName, m.address1, m.address2, m.sysName as profileSysName, thum.sysName as thumbNailSysName from (select * from (select distinct feedpostid from hashtag join posthashs using (tagid) where hashtag like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%') join feedpost using (feedpostid)) fe left join (select mem.userNo, mem.userNickName, mem.address1, mem.address2, prof.SysName from member mem left join photo prof on mem.userNo = prof.userNo) m on fe.UserNo = m.userNo left join (select feedPostID, sysName from (select p1.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY p1.feedpostid order by p1.feedpostid) rn2 from photo p1 inner join photo p2 on p1.feedpostid = p2.feedpostid) where rn2=1) thum on fe.feedPostId = thum.feedPostId ) f where rn between ${startFeedNum} and ${endFeedNum} order by rn asc

select f.* from (select fe.*,row_number() over(order by l.likecount desc nulls last, fe.FeedPostId desc) rn, m.userNickName, m.address1, m.address2, m.sysName as profileSysName, thum.sysName as thumbNailSysName from feedPost fe left join (select feedPostId, Count(feedPostId) as likecount from feedLike group by feedpostid) l on fe.feedPostId = l.feedPostId left join (select mem.userNo, mem.userNickName, mem.address1, mem.address2, prof.SysName from member mem left join photo prof on mem.userNo = prof.userNo) m on fe.UserNo = m.userNo left join (select feedPostID, sysName from (select p1.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY p1.feedpostid order by p1.feedpostid) rn2 from photo p1 inner join photo p2 on p1.feedpostid = p2.feedpostid) where rn2=1) thum on fe.feedPostId = thum.feedPostId ) f where rn between ${startFeedNum} and ${endFeedNum} order by rn asc
mapper.update: update feedpost set body = #{body} where feedpostid = ${feedpostid}
update photo set oriName=#{oriName}, sysname = #{sysname} where feedpostid = ${feedpostid}
mapper.select: select f.* from (select fe.*, row_number() over(order by fe.FeedPostId desc) rn, m.userNickName, m.address1, m.address2, m.sysName as profileSysName, thum.sysName as thumbNailSysName from feedPost fe left join (select mem.userNo, mem.userNickName, mem.address1, mem.address2, prof.SysName from member mem left join photo prof on mem.userNo = prof.userNo) m on fe.UserNo = m.userNo left join (select feedPostID, sysName from (select p1.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY p1.feedpostid order by p1.feedpostid) rn2 from photo p1 inner join photo p2 on p1.feedpostid = p2.feedpostid) where rn2=1) thum on fe.feedPostId = thum.feedPostId where fe.userNo In (select ToUserNo from follow where fromUserNo = ${userNo}) ) f where rn between ${startFeedNum} and ${endFeedNum} order by rn asc

select f.* from (select fe.*, row_number() over(order by fe.FeedPostId desc) rn, m.userNickName, m.address1, m.address2, m.sysName as profileSysName, thum.sysName as thumbNailSysName from feedPost fe left join (select mem.userNo, mem.userNickName, mem.address1, mem.address2, prof.SysName from member mem left join photo prof on mem.userNo = prof.userNo) m on fe.UserNo = m.userNo left join (select feedPostID, sysName from (select p1.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY p1.feedpostid order by p1.feedpostid) rn2 from photo p1 inner join photo p2 on p1.feedpostid = p2.feedpostid) where rn2=1) thum on fe.feedPostId = thum.feedPostId where fe.FeedPostId In (select sc.feedPostId from FeedScrap sc where sc.UserNo=${userNo}) ) f where rn between ${startFeedNum} and ${endFeedNum} order by rn asc

select f.* from (select fe.*, m.userNickName, m.address1, m.address2, m.sysName as profileSysName, thum.sysName as thumbNailSysName from feedPost fe left join (select mem.userNo, mem.userNickName, mem.address1, mem.address2, prof.SysName from member mem left join photo prof on mem.userNo = prof.userNo) m on fe.UserNo = m.userNo left join (select feedPostID, sysName from (select p1.*, ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY p1.feedpostid order by p1.feedpostid) rn2 from photo p1 inner join photo p2 on p1.feedpostid = p2.feedpostid) where rn2=1) thum on fe.feedPostId = thum.feedPostId ) f where f.feedpostId=${feedpostId}
